name: Blinding snow cabin - Demo
description:
Made for martymcbi during the Secret Santa Jam. (but not finished yet)

This is a random murder mystery generator. Whenever you die, a new murder is generated. Currently only features 2 mysteries.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Space/X/shift: action/ attack
  • F4: fullscreen (windows only)
